# GIFT Mathematical Correspondences

*Auto-generated from GIFT_ATLAS.yaml on 2025-12-11*

---

## Bernoulli-GIFT Correspondence

*Prime factors in denom(B_2(r+1)) encode GIFT constants for Lie group of rank r*

| Lie Group | Rank | B_index | Primes | GIFT Interpretation |
|-----------|------|---------|--------|---------------------|
| G2 | 2 | B_6 | 2, 3, 7 | 2=p2, 3=N_gen, 7=dim_K7 |
| F4 | 4 | B_10 | 2, 3, 5, 11 | 2=p2, 3=N_gen, 5=Weyl_factor, 11=D_bulk |
| E6 | 6 | B_14 | 2, 3, 7, 43 | 2=p2, 3=N_gen, 7=dim_K7, 43=visible_dim |
| E7 | 7 | B_16 | 2, 3, 5, 17, 257 | 2=p2, 3=N_gen (Fermat F0), 5=Weyl (Fermat F1), 17=lambda_H (Fermat F2), 257=dim_E8 + rank_E8 + 1 (Fermat F3) |
| E8 | 8 | B_18 | 2, 3, 7, 19 | 2=p2, 3=N_gen, 7=dim_K7, 19=prime_8 = prime(rank_E8) |

*Fibonacci sequence embedded in GIFT constants*

| F_n | Value | GIFT Constant |
|-----|-------|---------------|
| F1 | 1 | dim_U1 |
| F3 | 2 | p2 |
| F4 | 3 | N_gen |
| F5 | 5 | Weyl_factor |
| F6 | 8 | rank_E8 |
| F7 | 13 | alpha_sum_B |
| F8 | 21 | b2 |
| F9 | 34 | hidden_dim |
| F10 | 55 | dim_E7 - dim_E6 |
| F12 | 144 | (dim_G2 - p2)^2 |

| L_n | Value | GIFT Constant |

| L0 | 2 | p2 |

| L4 | 7 | dim_K7 |

## Fermat-GIFT Correspondence

*All known Fermat primes in GIFT*

| F_n | Value | GIFT Constant |
|-----|-------|---------------|
| F0 | 3 | N_gen |
| F1 | 5 | Weyl_factor |
| F2 | 17 | lambda_H_num |
| F3 | 257 | dim_E8 + rank_E8 + 1 |
